item.title: Angle of Attack Sensor Heater Systems

numlitem.para: Associated AOA vane is verified intact,
Remaining probe heater indicating systems for operative probe heaters are operative, and
Aircraft is not operated in known or forecast icing conditions.

note.para: No flight in known or forecast icing conditions.

numlitem.para: Operations in known or forecast icing conditions prohibited.

placard.para: Placard overhead panel "L(R) AOA HEAT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Verify associated AOA vane is intact by visually inspecting it to ensure it is not bent or missing, and moves freely.
